title: Supply shocks change relative prices and PL

content.question: Which of the following is true of supply shocks?

choices.label: They tend to change both relative prices and the general price level in the economy.
They affect only the general price level.
They can be anticipated and offset with appropriate fiscal policy.
They can be anticipated and offset with appropriate monetary policy.
They make the aggregate supply curve vertical.

content.answer: They tend to change both relative prices and the general price level in the economy.
